'''"And Action!"''' refers to both a song composed by Tone Deaf Rebellion, and a [[music disc]] that plays the song when inserted in a [[jukebox]]. The music disc was included in [[25w14craftmine]] on ''Java Edition''.

== Obtaining ==
Two ''And Action!'' discs can be obtained from the structure placed in Mines with the "Warden Boss Fight" [[Mine Ingredient|mine ingredient]] or the Warden special event.

It can additionally be obtained from a barrel in the "Relax Room" of the [[Hub]].

[[File:And Action 25w14craftmine.ogg]]

"And Action!" is a retro video game style song, using the Microsoft GS Wavetable Synth.

== Usage ==
Like all music discs, {{control|using}} the "And Action!" music disc on a [[jukebox]] causes the jukebox to play the song.

If the [[player]] places a [[redstone comparator]] besides a jukebox playing "And Action!", it will emit a [[Redstone mechanics|redstone signal]] of 15.
